description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. On a magical island where seasons change super quickly live tree frogs who are in a struggle for dominance all year around. It's every frog for themselves in a froggy free for all. Stay up in the branches and come down on your enemies like a ninja, or catch special flies for super powers!
description.short: On a magical island where seasons change super quickly live tree frogs who are in a struggle for dominance all year around. It's every frog for themselves in a froggy free for all.
